evidence: sampling in the spatial or time domain means multiplying the signal by an impulse train
In the frequency domain, that multiplication becomes a convolution
convolve the original spectrum with this delta train
multiple shifted copies of the original spectrum
the replicas overlap, and this overlap is what causes aliasing
we need a high enough sampling rate in the time domain
